items.title: Instant Summaries
items.description: Get concise video summaries in seconds, making information more accessible.

items.title: Upload Video
items.description: Easily upload your video by dragging and dropping or selecting from your files. Our system supports various formats.

items.title: AI Analysis
items.description: Our sophisticated AI analyzes your video, identifying key segments and summarizing content.

items.title: Download Summary
items.description: Review the summary and download it in a clear and accessible format.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied users who maximize their video content with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Smith
items.comment: The video summaries are a lifesaver! I can grasp content quickly without watching hours of footage.

items.name: John Lee
items.comment: As a content creator, this tool has transformed how I produce video highlights and engage my audience.

items.name: Mark Williams
items.comment: I appreciate the privacy and speed. It feels great knowing my videos are never stored!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about our AI Video Summary

items.title: What types of videos can you summarize?
items.description: We can summarize educational videos, webinars, tutorials, and more, capturing key insights and information.

items.title: Is the service fully free?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 20 free credits daily to generate summaries and additional credits can be earned through engaging with our platform.

items.title: Can I use the summaries commercially?
items.description: Paid subscribers can use generated summaries for commercial purposes, while free-tier users are encouraged to use them for personal projects.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All video processing occurs directly in your browser with no uploads to external servers, ensuring your content remains confidential.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Video Experience?
